name: Get an EXTRA life
description:
Oh no! You have died due to a small accident and now you are a ghost! Don't worry, you're in a video game, surely you can think of something to get out of this situation.

This was a submission for the GameDev.tv 2022 GameJam. Due to my limited free time and lack of programming knowledge, I used again Construct3 as engine. For the base I've used the "programming" files of this tutorial: https://www.construct.net/en/tutorials/platformer-game-2329

I've created all the sprites and tilesets with a graphic tablet in Krita. The sound effects are from freesound.org (CC0 1.0) and the background music is from https://opengameart.org/content/difference (also CC0). Font for the clock https://www.dafont.com/es/ghoulish-fright-aoe.font?l[]=10&l[]=1&text=Time+out%21...
